channel.title: Client Problem. Help would be Great!(:
channel.description:
Confused with the client. When I give the client out people can't connect. When i change the server = to 127.0.0.1 I then can connect. Whats the problem here? Help would be appreciative.
edit- Fixed.

item.title: Client Problem. Help would be Great!(:

item.description:
@Saphire1 wrote:

You need to port forward, refer to the tutorial section as there are plenty there.
